translations: n.（动物的）爪，爪子；（水生有壳动物的）螯，钳；爪形器具，钳形工具
v.（用爪）撕，抓；挠痒；（帆船）迎风而行

phrs.translation: 羊角锤；木工锤；燕尾服；拔钉锤

sentences.sentence: It has three pairs of legs, each ending in a large claw.
sentences.translation: 它有3对腿，每条腿的末端都有一个大爪子。

sentences.sentence: An iron claw gripped his shoulder.
sentences.translation: 一只铁爪抓住了他的肩膀。

sentences.sentence: Waiter, this lobster has only one claw.
sentences.translation: 服务员，这个龙虾只有一只爪。
